subSubSection.paragraph:
=
H. timha Mosely 1938
; synonymized by Dakki (1978) , Malicky (2005) .

=
H. flava Nybom 1948
; synonymized by Nybom (1954) , Malicky (2005) .
The larva of this species has been described and diagnosed by Allaya (2003) , Bemmoussat et al. (2021), Dakki & Tachet (1987) , and Malicky & Lounaci (1987) .

Material studied.
ALGERIA , Blida , Larbaa , Djemaa Wadi (S10) ( 36°33’49”N , 3°08’11”E )
,
80 m a.s.l.
:
25.iv.2013
, 1 larva ( CSK20 ). Hammam Melouane , Seghir Wadi (S6) ( 36°28’52”N , 3°03’00”E )
, 300 m a.s.l.: 22.ii.2013 , 1 larva ;
25.iv.2013
, 1 larva ( CSK21 ). Hammam Melouane , Badour Wadi (S8) ( 36°28’43”N , 3°04’07”E )
, 410 m a.s.l.: 02.xi.2012 , 1 larva ;
07.xi.2013
, 1 larva ( CSK22 ). Maktaa Lazreg , Boumaane Wadi (S1) ( 36°27’27”N , 3°00’27”E )
,
270 m a.s.l.
:
22.iii.2013
, 1 larva ( CSK23 )
.
Distribution. Algeria , Europe, Morocco , and Tunisia .
